message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $140. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm getting closer to a deal. I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $132.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $129.50. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $129 for the product.
